source: #Write a python program to find the factorial of a number

#To find factorial of any number
import math

num = 10
print("Factorial of", num, "is",math.factorial(num))

outputs.name: stdout
text:
Enter number5
Factorial= 5
Factorial= 20
Factorial= 60
Factorial= 120
Factorial= 120

source:
#also we can try in loop function
i=int(input("Enter number"))
fac=1
while i>0:
    fac=fac*i
    i=i-1
    print("Factorial=",fac)

source: #Write a python program to check whether a given string is palindrome or not

#One more easy way to find palindrome string
a=input("Enter any string")
b=a[-1::-1]#using slicing technique
if (a==b):
    print("Is Plaindrome")
    
else:
    print("Not Palindrome")
#Write a Python program to get the third side of right-angled triangle from two given sides.

from math import sqrt

a = float(input("Enter base: "))#first side
b = float(input("Enter height: "))#second side
c = sqrt(a ** 2 + b ** 2)#finding third side

print("Hypotenuse =", c)
#Write a python program to print the frequency of each of the characters present in a given string

outputs.name: stdout
text:
Enter any string:madarasi
Enter the character:a
Number of time found= 3

source:
#to find out frequency of the character in a given string 

st=input("Enter any string:")
ch=input("Enter the character:")
f=0
for i in st:
    if i ==ch:
        f=f+1
print("Number of time found=",f)
